name: Torque Color
description:
Research told us our brain have to be trained often to keep it work efficiently. We suggest you to train your brain with Crazy Brain Training:What Color?.

How To Play:

The game will appear text prompts, such as "green" word. Then there will be a color, you only need to select "Yes" or "No". It seems very easy, in fact not, Would you like to have a try?
